author: Jeffery Martin
title: China Is Part of the 'New Axis of Evil,' Must Be Held Accountable for Pandemic, Senator Blackburn Says
description: "We know they caused the COVID virus," Blackburn said. "They did this by hiding information, by lying about what was happening.
content:
China is part of the "new axis of evil" and must be held to account for the global coronavirus pandemic and the devastating economic consequences of containing it, Senator Marsha Blackburn said.
Blackburn, a Tennessee Republican, is pushing legislation that … [+3366 chars]
